agents.airline_operating_centre.AirlineOperatingCentre¶

class agents.airline_operating_centre.AirlineOperatingCentre(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Agent

Agent representing an airline operating centre.

This includes: - Processes related to flight and fleet management, such as:

  • selection of flight plan

  • planning of flight plan

  • compute dynamic cost index for speed adjustment of flights

  • turnaround operation management

  • Processes related to management of passengers, such as:

    • Passengers reallocation

    • Passenger handler

The decisions are mostly driven by expected cost of delay

get_average_price_on_leg(flight_uid)¶

This is computed using only the price paid by passengers without connection if possible. If there is none, use the number of legs as weight. Using the central registry

give_compensation_func(compensation_func)¶

give_delay_distr(dist)¶

random numbers following dist should be drawn using dist.rvs(random_state=self.agent.rs) or dist.rvs(5)

give_duty_of_care_func(duty_of_care_func)¶

Compensation should a function taking as first argument the delay and as second one the type of passenger.

give_non_pax_cost_delay(dict_np_cost, dict_np_cost_fit)¶

For ‘dict_np_cost’, the first level key should be the type of aircraft. The second level key be the phase of flight: -at_gate, -taxi, -airborne The values are the cost (in euros) per minute of a delay.

For ‘dict_np_cost_fit’, the first level should the phase of flight. The second level should have ‘a’ and ‘b’. These coefficients should used when the aircraft type if no available in the first dictionary, using the sqrt of the MTOW of the aircraft: c = a + b * sqrt(MTWO), where c is the cost of one minute of delay, as per above.

register_aircraft(aircraft)¶

register_airport(airport)¶

Add one airport to the list of airports in the AOC

mcts are designed so that one can do: mcts = self.aoc_airports_info[airport_uid][‘mcts’] mct = mcts[(self.aoc_flights_info[flight_uid1][‘international’], self.aoc_flights_info[flight_uid2][‘international’])]
